price: 34. Waxaan idiin soo dejinnay Aayado cad cad24, iyo tusaale kuwii tegay hortiin, iyo waanada kuwa (ka) dhowrsada (xumaha).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتٖ مُّبَيِّنَٰتٖ وَمَثَلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ وَمَوۡعِظَةٗ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
footnotes: 24. Waa xukunnada iyo xeerarka, gaar ahaan kuwa ku soo arooray Suuraddan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad anzalnā ilaykum āyātin mubayyinātin wamathalan mina alladhīna khalaw min qablikum wamawʿiẓatan lil'muttaqīna
